sfField.summary: The Contract Periodic Billing that this detail record is associated with.
The Covered Serialized Device associated with this billing charge.
Not Applicable
Not Applicable
Not Applicable

sfField.formula: if(ISPICKVAL(rstk__soconpbdtl_type__c , 'Device Recurring Charge') || ISPICKVAL(rstk__soconpbdtl_type__c , 'Once Per Contract Period'), rstk__soconpbdtl_soconpbrc__r.rstk__soconpbrc_taxable__c, rstk__soconpbdtl_soconchg__r.rstk__soconchg_taxable__c)

if(ISPICKVAL(rstk__soconpbdtl_type__c , 'Device Recurring Charge') || ISPICKVAL(rstk__soconpbdtl_type__c , 'Once Per Contract Period'), rstk__soconpbdtl_soconpbrc__r.rstk__soconpbrc_taxrate__c , rstk__soconpbdtl_soconchg__r.rstk__soconchg_taxrate__c)

sfField.summary: Not Applicable
Amount billed for this charge in this run.
User-defined comments up to 100 characters in length.
The number of days that this recurring charge represents.
Comments intended to be printed on any document generated for Customer.
identifier to check whether it is a part of ‘Generate Recurring Billing’ process or not
Comments not intended to be printed on any document generated for Customer.
The Sales (Revenue) account to which this charge will be debited.
The sequence number of this Contract Periodic Billing Detail, which is a unique identifier for each detail record associated with a given Contract Periodic Billing.
When charge is from a Miscellaneous Charge, this is the Miscellaneous Charge record that was set up for this Contract that drove this charge.
The Covered Serialized Device associated with this billing charge.
When charge is from a Recurring Charge, this is the Recurring Charge record that was set up for this Contract that drove this charge.
The Sales Invoice Line associated with this billing.
The Product record for the Product associated with the Recurring Charge or Miscellaneous Charge.
When checked, indicates charge is taxable, as defined on the "charge" record that drove this billing.
The Tax Amount based on the charge and its Tax Rate.
When the Taxable indicator is checked, this is the rate at which the charge will be taxed, as defined on the "charge" record that drove this billing.

The charge type for this billing detail record. Valid values are 

Device Recurring Charge
Device Miscellaneous Charge
Contract Miscellaneous Charge
This is an internal system field which is not currently displayed on any Rootstock User pages.
